publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4571 Alasdair Allan: Western Isles Island Games Success—That the Parliament congratulates the Western Isles Island Games Team for its achievements in competing in the 13th Natwest Island Games in the Åland islands from 27 June 2009 to 4 July 2009; recognises the success of Eilidh MacKenzie in winning gold in the 1,500 metres and silver in the 800 metres, Donnie MacLeod in winning silver in the 400 metres, Alison Campbell in winning bronze in the 10,000 metres and Mairi MacCormack and Alison Campbell in winning bronze in the half marathon team event; notes the further success of Eilidh MacKenzie in winning her second Island Games Gold medal in consecutive games in Rhodes 2007 and Åland 2009, and wishes the Western Isles team well in preparing for the 2011 Island Games on the Isle of Wight. Supported by: Rob Gibson*, Bob Doris*, Aileen Campbell*, Bill Kidd*, Kenneth Gibson*, Stuart McMillan*, Jamie McGrigor*, David Stewart*
